Package de.oth.programs

Class MultiplayerFirstTestClientAIProgram

java.lang.Object
de.oth.programs.tests.MultiplayerFirstTestProgram
de.oth.programs.MultiplayerFirstTestClientAIProgram
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockLibProgram
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractPythonAIStateMachineProgram
public class MultiplayerFirstTestClientAIProgram
extends MultiplayerFirstTestProgram
Created to test the machine learning AI
It can be run in headless mode (no window) for a) better learning since no rendering of the surrounding so the GPU can concentrate on the python script. And b) to add AI-NPCs without having additional windows
Author:
Raphael Neudert

    • onGameStart

      public void onGameStart()
      Description copied from interface: BlockLibProgram
      Gets called once, when the game starts. Can be used for initialization. Either "game.createFilledWorld()" or "game.createEmptyWorld()" has to be called here. CAREFUL! Since the world is not yet created, it can not be used to set Blocks into the world.
      Specified by:
      onGameStart in interface BlockLibProgram
      Overrides:
      onGameStart in class MultiplayerFirstTestProgram
